title: has anyone received their 6+1 bonus yet?
body:
Theres a few days remaining until riot finishes giving out the bonus skins but i was wondering if anyone has received them.
If you did, which skin did you get?

replies.body: what the hell is this? i must of missed out on something
There was a mystery skin/chest event not so long ago where you would get 1 free skin for every 6 mystery skin/chests you bought for yourself or for friends

> [{quoted}](name=5318008,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uLamAUii,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-13T08:14:43.402+0000)
>
> There was a mystery skin/chest event not so long ago where you would get 1 free skin for every 6 mystery skin/chests you bought for yourself or for friends

ah ok thanks

this doesn't affect me since i dont buy gifts xd
Nope nothing yet. Tried to have a look in the news section but nothing there at all.
Nope still waiting on my few.

> [{quoted}](name=whitehatingcoon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uLamAUii,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-13T07:09:15.734+0000)
>im waiting for 11 :D
> Nope still waiting on my few.
Just trying to compile a list like mine :P haha
i did a 1:1 to get list and waiting for their reply
Nope. They said it would take up to a week, so until the 17th.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uLamAUii,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-13T06:17:30.328+0000)
>
> Nope. They said it would take up to a week, so until the 17th.

hence "Theres a few days remaining until riot finishes giving out"

They said they would be given out within a week of event finishing so i was wondering if anyone had received theirs
